verses.verse: <S%G3063>Finally<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> we <S%G2065>beg<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3880>received<s%> from <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G4052>abound<s%> more and <S%G3123>more.<s%>

<S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> one should take <S%G5233>advantage<s%> of <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4122>wrong<s%> <S%G846>a<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> or sister <S%G1722>in<s%> this <S%G4229>matter;<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is an <S%G1558>avenger<s%> <S%G4012>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5130>things,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4277>we<s%> <S%G4277>forewarned<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1263>testified.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>love,<s%> you have <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2192>need<s%> that one <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> taught by <S%G2312>God<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%>

<S%G2532>for<s%> <S%G1063>indeed<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that you <S%G4052>abound<s%> more and <S%G3123>more;<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> that you make it your <S%G5389>ambition<s%> to lead a <S%G2270>quiet<s%> <S%G2532>life,<s%> and to <S%G4238>do<s%> your own <S%G2398>business,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2038>work<s%> <S%G2398>with<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> we <S%G3853>instructed<s%> <S%G5213>you;<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2156>properly<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> those who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1854>outside,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G3367>nothing.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to be <S%G50>ignorant,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> those who have fallen <S%G2837>asleep,<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3076>grieve<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2531>like<s%> the <S%G3062>rest,<s%> who <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rose <S%G450>again,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>will<s%> <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who have fallen <S%G2837>asleep<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> we <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> who are <S%G2198>alive,<s%> who are <S%G4035>left<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5348>will<s%> in <S%G3361>no<s%> way <S%G5348>precede<s%> those who have fallen <S%G3756>asleep.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> will <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G2752>shout,<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G743>archangel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4536>trumpet.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> will <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%>
